src_original: asti duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā /  asti duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā /  asti sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā /  asti sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā /  tatra katamā sā duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā?  ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvrarāgo bhavati,  tīvradveṣo bhavati,  tīvramoho bhavati /
iyaṃ duḥkhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā  / tatra katamā duḥkhā pratipatkṣiprābhijñā?
tgt_original: 復有苦行跡所行速疾。 「彼云何名為樂行跡所行愚惑？

src_original: ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvrarāgo bhavati,  tīvradveṣo bhavati,  tīvramoho bhavati /  so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgatayā rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /  abhīkṣṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /  tīvramohatayā mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /  tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni /
tgt_original: 或有一人貪欲熾盛，瞋恚、愚癡熾盛，所行甚苦，不與行本相應，彼人五根愚闇亦不捷疾。

src_original: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
tgt_original: 所謂信根、精進根、念根、慧根、定根。

src_original: ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva alparāgo bhavati,  alpadveṣo bhavati /

so '(lpa)rāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ  alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /  alpamohatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /  tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni na tīkṣṇāni na śīghravāhīni /
tgt_original: 然於貪欲，恒自偏少不慇懃，為瞋恚、愚癡極為減少，五根捷疾無有放逸。

src_original: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryandriyaṃ smḥtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ /
tgt_original: 所謂信根、精進根、念根、定根、慧根，是謂五根。

src_original: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ dhandhātvānmḥdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spḥśati yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /  iyaṃ sukhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā //
tgt_original: 然得五根成於三昧，盡有漏成無漏，是謂名為利根行於道跡也。
或有一人婬意偏多，瞋恚、愚癡熾盛。

src_original: so 'lparāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /  alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaḥ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /  alpamohatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ prativedayati / tasyemāni  pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇyadhimātrāṇi tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni /  katamāni pañca?
tgt_original: 彼以此法而自娛樂，盡有漏成無漏，是謂名為苦行跡鈍根者也。 「云何苦行跡行於速疾？
